channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-28529] ChangelogPeriodicMaterializationSwitchStateBackendITCase.testSwitchFromDisablingToEnablingInClaimMode failed with CheckpointException: Checkpoint expired before completing

item.summary: ChangelogPeriodicMaterializationSwitchStateBackendITCase.testSwitchFromDisablingToEnablingInClaimMode failed with CheckpointException: Checkpoint expired before completing

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Hi Yanfei Lei, could you help take a look?
Sure, look like it's caused by checkpoint expired, I will check it.

Anther failed instance https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=38128&view=logs&j=5c8e7682-d68f-54d1-16a2-a09310218a49&t=86f654fa-ab48-5c1a-25f4-7e7f6afb9bba.
But the stack is different:

Hi Yanfei Lei Any updates on the progress?
This is related to the instability of triggering checkpoint, I would open a PR after https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/19864 megered.
Hi Yanfei Lei, I have merged the PR https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/19864 . You can go on your work.
Hi Yanfei Lei Any updates on the progress?
Sorry for the late reply, I refactored the test, and the PR is waiting to be reviewed.
